name: To Die in the Shade
storyline:
Bulan has always believed in the power of his god. After all, who else lights the sky in all his splendor? Who else staves off the shadows even in the darkest of nights?

However, when women begin to disappear in the streets of Pequeño Mar — taken in the cradle of night against a backdrop of leather wings and desperate screams — he is forced to put his faith to the test like his saints before him...

...and slay the beast.
summary: A gothic romance visual novel retelling of The Beauty and the Beast.
